content: lion brand pattern # 10539 *chs-tasseledthrow pdf* skill level beginner level 1 790-320 homespun yarn regency 6 balls crochet hook - size q-19 **15 75 mm** entire afghan is worked with 2 strands of yarn held together *because of the texture of homespun the fringe will fray when cut if you prefer a non-frayed look you can knot the ends knit or crochet a fringe or use hairspray or fray checktm by dritz® * *free registration at site required to access pattern *
